---
title: GHQ 12 vs RPQ
url: "/compare-harmonise-instruments/ghq-12-vs-rpq/"
date: 2025-01-24
---

## GHQ 12 vs RPQ

Harmony offers a next-generation tool for researchers to perform comparative analysis between different psychological questionnaires like GHQ 12 and RPQ (Reactive-Proactive Aggression Questionnaire). This powerful software leverages advanced natural language processing and generative AI models. By using Harmony's extensive features, researchers can evaluate the percentage match between each item in GHQ 12 versus RPQ, expediting the harmonisation process. Traditionally, comparing different questionnaire items has been a manually intense and time-consuming task. However, with Harmony, this becomes a seamless process. Making use of Harmony's extensive database, psychologists can easily select GHQ 12 and RPQ for comparison or upload their own tools in PDF format. Furthermore, Harmony supports multiple languages, broadening the scope of exploration in their GHQ 12 versus RPQ comparison. In conclusion, Harmony presents a compelling solution for psychologists seeking to conduct an in-depth GHQ 12 vs RPQ comparison. By automating the harmonisation process with advanced AI models, researchers can concentrate on interpreting the results rather than wearisome data entry. Whether you're involved in cohort or longitudinal studies, Harmony allows you to maximise your productivity and broaden the soundness of your research.
